                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Dennis Manning
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-is-White-America-so-afraid-of-Colin-Kaepernicks-protest/answer/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            February 17, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Studied at
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             Mineral Area College
                            </span>
                           </span>
                           (Graduated 2010)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            They aren’t afraid at all. They are perplexed. * He talks about oppression. Which rights of the Constitution are given to whites that the blacks don’t have? Do blacks not have legal redress in court? Have blacks been kept from positions of government? Is interracial marriage and dating banned? Are there no hate crime laws on the books? * He talks about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , and yet he was raised by white parents. He has made millions, and his color was never a factor in how he got his job. He’s living proof that while
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            exists, it’s not
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            anymore. * He says officers need more training. And yet, training standards are MORE stringent than they used to be. He is a study in contradictory narratives, and clueless to the hypocrisy of it all.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Some-people-say-peaceful-protesters-should-be-distinguished-from-arsonists-looters-violent-rioters-and-police-attackers-Then-why-do-people-taint-the-entire-police-force-as-racists-not-distinguishing-bad-police" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Some people say peaceful protesters should be distinguished from arsonists, looters, violent rioters, and police attackers. Then, why do people taint the entire police force as racists, not distinguishing bad police officers from good ones?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-20282838-200-lbxdylnqebfnssxbthmbmnmywjagobza.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Mike Jones
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Some-people-say-peaceful-protesters-should-be-distinguished-from-arsonists-looters-violent-rioters-and-police-attackers-Then-why-do-people-taint-the-entire-police-force-as-racists-not-distinguishing-bad-police/answer/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 14, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Technology
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Over 30 years in the technology industry.
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            People who “taint the entire police force as racists” are making an error. Most people aren’t saying that, though. We’re saying that there is
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in the justice system, and particularly in the police. That doesn’t mean “all police are racist”. Quite the contrary, it means that the system is designed so there are incentives that tend to produce racist outcomes even when many people working in the system are not intentionally racist.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-racist-but-is-often-regarded-as-not-racist" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What is racist, but is often regarded as not racist?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mads-Olsen-3" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-126055844-200-uvijmbqwmmtuqafnpscttvdkbmhvuqdk.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>

                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mads-Olsen-3" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Mads Olsen
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-racist-but-is-often-regarded-as-not-racist/answer/Mads-Olsen-3" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            Updated December 29, 2017
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Politics
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Former intern at the Danish Parliament.
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            1. Accusing my ancestors of slavery. Yes, I’m white. No, my ancestors didn’t own slaves. Just because you are white doesn’t mean that your ancestors owned slaves. 2. Saying being white is easy. One of my white friends was raped, beaten by her father and tried to kill herself numerous times. Being white doesn’t mean you’re guaranteed a good life. 3. Affirmative action. It’s not reverse
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . It’s
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . When I discovered that people actually defended a system which discriminated against people because of their ethnicity, I was surprised. I thought it was only the KKK that would do that.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-there-such-thing-as-discrimination-racism-against-white-people" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Is there such thing as discrimination/racism against white people?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">

                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                                 </span>

                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-there-such-thing-as-discrimination-racism-against-white-people/answer/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            February 2
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Occasional superhero, veteran, family man!
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            That’s the weird thing about racism…it knows no color. The only ingredient for
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is at least two people of different races and a hateful attitude by one. Any skin tone can be racist. Not having
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            power doesn’t excuse hateful acts to another race. You can be racist and have no power at all. The answer to your question is YES.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Andrew-Weill" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Andrew Weill
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>

                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-do-lawyers-think-of-systemic-racism/answer/Andrew-Weill" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 24, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Psychology of Everyday Life
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             I engage in everyday life nearly every day, these days
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            I’m against it. 1. The more that the system delivers justice to all, the more opportunities for lawyers. 2. Systemic
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            artificially depresses the wealth opportunities for minorities. The more wealth for minorities, the more opportunities for lawyers. 3. It’s inconsistent with some old-fashioned ideas I was taught about “liberty and justice for all.” It certainly strikes me that if I want liberty and justice for myself, it should be afforded to others. 4. I have seen the effects of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            injustice. It harms its victims and its perpetrators. It’s a lose-lose proposition. 5. There’s this thing called the equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment. It’s a cool idea. We should totally do that. In fact, I’ll stick my neck out a bit and say that I’m really against
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            .
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/As-a-conservative-what-do-you-think-about-this-article-Dear-white-people-your-dictionary-definition-of-racism-is-wrong" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       As a conservative what do you think about this article "Dear white people your dictionary definition of
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       is wrong?"
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Murphy-Barrett" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-61175604-200-xrwujgnrezmrpullnmkxbrfuhsfadzvo.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>

                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Murphy-Barrett" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Murphy Barrett
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>

                            </div>
                           </div>

                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/As-a-conservative-what-do-you-think-about-this-article-Dear-white-people-your-dictionary-definition-of-racism-is-wrong/answer/Murphy-Barrett" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            July 2, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            As a conservative what do you think about this article "Dear white people your dictionary definition of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is wrong?" Dear White People, Your "Dictionary Definition" of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is Wrong Well, if the title of the article itself didn’t tell me all I needed to know, this gem right here sealed the deal.
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is not “systemic”. We actually have a phrase to describe
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . It’s “systemic racism”. From On
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            by Murphy Barrett One would think that the definition of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            were simple. If we consult the Oxford English Dictionary,
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is defined as 1. Prejudice, discrimination, or antagonism directed against someone of a different race based on the belief that one's own race is superior. a. 1.1) The belief that all members of each race possess characteristics, abilities, or qualities speci
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>

                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-did-the-police-in-Kenosha-let-an-underage-boy-circulate-with-a-firearm-and-didnt-even-attempt-to-check-on-him-after-the-shooting-Is-it-incompetence" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Why did the police in Kenosha let an underage boy circulate with a firearm and didn't even attempt to check on him after the shooting? Is it incompetence?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                           </span>

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-did-the-police-in-Kenosha-let-an-underage-boy-circulate-with-a-firearm-and-didnt-even-attempt-to-check-on-him-after-the-shooting-Is-it-incompetence/answer/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            August 29
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Guns and Firearms
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Well armed leftist
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Incompetence, yes, but more so, blatant
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . When they asked for 200 National Guards to be brought in because they were afraid and unable to deal with a legal protest over their incompetence and
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , that was further incompetence. When they refused to investigate gun fire in the night or ask the guard to look into it, that was incompetence tinged with
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . When they were preferential to “militias” over the diverse National Guard, that was
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            tinted with incompetence. When they treated black and white participants in the deadly event so differently, that was just plain
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . The Kenosha police cover the whole spectrum of gross incompetence (itself a side effect of white privilege in this case) and deadly,
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , with special immunity. Extra points for a chief that goes
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
