             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-are-your-thoughts-on-how-we-can-end-systematic-racism-in-the-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What are your thoughts on how we can end systematic
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       in the US?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Judy-Parker-61" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-607032207-200-kriqghljevdocczptdllbuangcdnwagp.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto qu-alignSelf--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Judy-Parker-61" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Judy Parker
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-are-your-thoughts-on-how-we-can-end-systematic-racism-in-the-US/answer/Judy-Parker-61" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            September 9
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            We need to abolish affirmative action. Affirmative action is an example of actual
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . What are your thoughts on how we can end systematic
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in the US?
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Should-the-class-system-be-eventually-abolished-in-the-UK-Is-the-US-style-society-a-better-model-for-the-British" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Should the class system be eventually abolished in the UK? Is the US-style society a better model for the British?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Alec-Cawley" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Should-the-class-system-be-eventually-abolished-in-the-UK-Is-the-US-style-society-a-better-model-for-the-British/answer/Alec-Cawley" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            November 20, 2019

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">

                           Software Engineer
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Consider first the beam in your own eye. The US should abolish
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            before it comes after the UK for the class system. Like the US race system, the UK class system has no organisation running, no laws that enforce it. In fact, like
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , there are laws against it, that don’t always work. The US has more of a class system than the UK. But it is based on a combination of race, religion and money, as opposed to the UK’s very weak ancestry based one. when a gay black atheist whose unmarried parents were share croppers has the same opportunity as a straight white member of a “good” church whose parents were Ivy League, I will admit that the US has no class system.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Is the USA the most racist country in the world?
                      </span>

                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-2498756-200-vbkfbneuedwoyvgkypydikqhbcooabdh.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>

                            </div>

                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-the-USA-the-most-racist-country-in-the-world/answer/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            Updated August 25, 2019
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Race and Ethnicity
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             African in America
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            As an immigrant, I’m going to say that the answer to this is a strong no. In the US, a large segment of the population is aware that
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is bad. Even people who hold racist opinions have a negative opinion of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . This is why so many of them feel the need to preface their comments with “I’m not racist, but…” This kind of awareness that bigotry in the abstract, as opposed to bigotry directed against one’s own group, is a bad thing is really rare elsewhere in the world. The kind of prejudice that you encounter on a daily basis in many countries of the world has no sense of shame. People will be subjected to intense mockery for nothing more than having an accent. People will casually mention in polite society that immigrants from Haiti or Lebanon or Liberia or Ghana or Nigeria or Poland
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>

               </div>

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">

                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            (Please read all of this before you start with the hateful comments. I admit in it that
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            exists, and that it’s wrong. I’m not denying that. Lots of things bother me about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . But the question is: What bothers you the MOST about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . So here it goes…) What bothers me the most about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            ? That the political left in the US uses it to try and silence their opposition. It worked for awhile too, but then people started to see through it and now it’s not as effective as it used to be in getting people who disagree with you to “sit down and shut up”. Which is part of the reason why the left has found new insults to hurl at someone to silence them: “sexist”, “homophobe”, etc… And when they had a hard time finding actual racist individuals, the left began with their “institutional raci
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>

                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Scorpio, INFP-A, living with Bipolar Depression  (1993–present)

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            I do, often. Especially as of late. The following conversation is one I had with drumroll someone on YouTube. I posted a comment on a video about 10 things black people demand from white people, something along those lines. Me: I find this whole thing ridiculous. You're telling white people who inherit homes to give them up supposedly because black people cant work to earn one on their own. Isn't that
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            itself? YouTuber: No it's not
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            !! Thanks to slavery and Jim Crow, black people are at a disadvantage. Ever heard of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            ??!! Me: Yes I have and I have yet to see an example of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in modern day America. YouTuber: Nigga you don't know shit! Don't you know about discrimination against black people getting houses back then?? RED LINING???!!! Me: Yes I have and that h
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-the-difference-between-western-white-racism-and-Chinese-racism" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What is the difference between western, white
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       and Chinese
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       ?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Robert-Burton-7" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-32692501-200-pofavgmqtidfjzclikfnzsevibntkecx.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Robert-Burton-7" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Robert Burton
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-the-difference-between-western-white-racism-and-Chinese-racism/answer/Robert-Burton-7" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            Updated November 11, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Adjunct Professor at
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             EF English First (company)
                            </span>
                           </span>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            O…….k. As a an African-American who lived in China for 6 years, I think I am uniquely suited to answer this question. So, sit down and see yourself through the eyes of a real outsider. First, both have completely different origins and roots. In the Western world, what we define as
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            was created by Northern European scholars in order to debase and dehumanize people who weren't white and weren’t Christian. It was a world view created to rationalize slavery and colonialism and help the participants to sleep at night, knowing that they were committing unspeakable atrocities. White
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is much more thought out, much more pervasive and is much older. White
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is “backed” by “sciences” like eugenics and evolution. It’s the belief that a people are inherently inferior because they aren
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-are-some-good-examples-of-racism-on-Quora" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What are some good examples of
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       on Quora?

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Hanan-Baba" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">

                            </span>

                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            I had no idea that
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            was such a big problem in the Indian subcontinent before I joined Quora. I knew there was a lot of colourism  here. But
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            ? I thought it was just a problem of the West. On Quora, I came across some really racist Indians, Pakistanis, and in particular Kashmiris. I saw answers that try to prove that the whole human civilization originated in India. The answers of these sort end up justifying caste system and tell you that Brahmans are the real Aryans of the world. The purest race. I saw commenters who commented how all the Indians have filth in their DNA and are “filthy Aryans mixed with Dravidians.” A few self proclaimed genealogy experts proved Kashmiris are Europeans and all the others in the subcontinent are dirty mixed race. The level of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            some of the answe
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>

              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Does-your-family-know-that-you-write-on-Quora" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Does your family know that you write on Quora?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>

                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-2498756-200-vbkfbneuedwoyvgkypydikqhbcooabdh.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>

                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>

                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Habib Fanny
                                 </span>
                                </a>

                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Does-your-family-know-that-you-write-on-Quora/answer/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            April 5, 2018
                           </a>

                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Political Animal, Physician, Goofball, and All Around Nerd.
                          </div>

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            My little sister does. She’s been disappointed in some of my writings. I care about income inequality and systematic
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            at every level of the criminal “justice” system. But I have a hard time getting very worked up about what I consider the cosmetics of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . She’s more militantly Black than I will ever be. If Sam Morningstar were describing her, he would say that she was more of a Marxist identitarian than I am. I just shrug.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>

                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Do conservatives/Republicans actually believe liberals/Democrats are more racist against blacks, or is that a strategically deployed lie?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>

                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                            November 24, 2017
                           </a>

                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Political Conservatism
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             I've been a conservative since I've known what politics is
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            “Do conservatives/Republicans actually believe liberals/Democrats are more racist against blacks, or is that a strategically deployed lie?” Zarrella-Fact rates this claim… Half-True. If we’re talking specifically about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            against blacks rather than all forms of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , then it is undeniable that the lion’s share of overt racists are Republican (or at least more likely to vote GOP, regardless of official party affiliation). That is, there aren’t many Democratic Klansmen or any of the other sorts who would overtly and consciously speak against “n*gg*rs” or talk about how blacks need to “learn their place” or whatever. However, there are two forms of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            that are vastly more prevalent among Democrats and/or other progressives: 1. “Benign” racism—Which is really more racist? The attitude whic
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/George-Zimmerman-and-Darren-Wilson-each-killed-a-person-in-self-defence-Zimmerman-was-tried-due-to-public-pressure-while-Wilson-got-off-despite-similar-pressure-Zimmerman-is-brown-Wilson-is-white-Is-this-actual" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       George Zimmerman and Darren Wilson each killed a person in self-defence. Zimmerman was tried due to public pressure while Wilson got off despite similar pressure. Zimmerman is brown. Wilson is white. Is this actual evidence of
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       systemic
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       ?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
