                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-285024092-200-dgftoointueidthyjcytdebpeymslohv.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>

                             </a>
                            </div>

                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/George-Zimmerman-and-Darren-Wilson-each-killed-a-person-in-self-defence-Zimmerman-was-tried-due-to-public-pressure-while-Wilson-got-off-despite-similar-pressure-Zimmerman-is-brown-Wilson-is-white-Is-this-actual/answer/Dennis-Manning-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            January 1, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Occasional superhero, veteran, family man!
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            The premise is false. Zimmerman was tried in accordance with law. Wilson was investigated by the Ferguson Police, the St. Louis Police (as an impartial investigation), and the Department of Justice. Both were found innocent of wrongdoing. Wilson actually went through more scrutiny, as he was a law enforcement officer. If this was evidence of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , then it would be
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            against whites. Both men got their day in court, were found not guilty due to preponderance of the evidence, and exonerated. No
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            here.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>

               </div>

             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-this-true-racism-prejudice-power-or-can-members-of-minorities-be-racist" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Is this true: “racism = prejudice + power” or can members of minorities be racist?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">

                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                             <span>
                              Race and Ethnicity
                             </span>

                            </span>

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            It’s true if you happen to be sitting in a sociology class where it's defined that way. Otherwise it’s nothing more than the imposition of academic jargon on the rest of the population. For the vast majority of people on the planet,
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is race-based discrimination or bigotry. That’s it. Power is completely irrelevant. Otherwise, imagine this: Let’s say you’re a proud racist. You’re a card-carrying member of the KKK. You support white supremacy unabashedly. You live in a country where you are a member of the dominant race. Now, you decide to go on a safari to Tanzania. Your plane lands and, all of a sudden, you are in a place where your in-group lacks the preponderance of power. Does it mean that you’re no longer racist? Does this mean that you can take a vacation from being a racist, then
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>

                       Why does Ben Shapiro only debate college students?

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Ian-Stephens-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Ian-Stephens-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-does-Ben-Shapiro-only-debate-college-students/answer/Ian-Stephens-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            July 2, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Political junkie
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Because Ben Shapiro’s brand is a contradiction. He presents himself as the intellectual conservative whose logic and reasoning is deftly wielded to own the Libs. The issue is that many, many of the things he says are either cherry-picked, misrepresented, fallacious, straight-up wrong, or some combination of these.  For example, in this clip, the original version of which has 206,000 views on YouTube and many hundreds of thousands more in the various “Ben Shapiro destroys leftists” YouTube compilations it’s included in, Ben asks a student who confronts him about institutional
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            to, “name an institution that is racist.” Ben Shapiro Takes on Institutional
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            and White Privilege The college student taking part in a Q&amp;A that he is ‘debating’ here appeared to be unprepared for this respons
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Do-you-believe-that-victimhood-is-truly-prevalent-in-modern-American-society" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Do you believe that victimhood is truly prevalent in modern American society?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            As bad as the public school system has become in the past 30 years, it is now infected with a disgraceful program called the 1619 Project. White children are taught to be ashamed of their race and black children are taught they have been abused and neglected by
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in the United States for more than 400 years. Those who cannot compete in society because of mental or physical defects are no longer encouraged to overcome their shortcomings. It is now fashionable to cop a plea of victimhood and to go join a gang like Antifa, BLM, or MS-13 and inflict your poisoned psyche on the world. Public Schools Are Teaching The 1619 Project ... - Reason.com https://Reason.com/2020/01/28/1619-project-new-york-times-public-schools
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is entrenched power systems, policies, procedures and training that causes people of color to see fewer opportunities and find themselves at the pointy end of law enforcement more often. It’s covert
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . That’s not fixed by talking to overt racists. It’s fixed by taking the reins of power and forcing change to align with the long past recognition that people of color are equal.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>

                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">

                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Someone-said-it-isnt-systematic-racism-it-is-systemic-racism-What-is-the-difference-between-the-two/answer/Dushka-Zapata" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 12, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">

                           I am a writer.
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            If I do something systematically I do it methodically, in an organized, deliberate way. It’s precise and thorough.
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is entirely different - it means it is indivisible from the whole, ingrained, inseparable, intrinsic. Even when you are being systematic, you can’t fix
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            if it’s
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . Because
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            means it’s not that there is something wrong with the system. It means it is the system.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Is the Varna system (वर्ण-व्यवस्था) right in your opinion/eye?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>

                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Akhilesh-Yaradal" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-1151283334-200-voreuyvzdcfcgywwtlfiulgqnbxoqqxo.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>

                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                                 <span>
                                  Akhilesh Yaradal
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>

                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-the-Varna-system-वर्ण-व्यवस्था-right-in-your-opinion-eye/answer/Akhilesh-Yaradal" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            July 25, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Studied at
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             Karnatak Lingayat Education Society
                            </span>
                           </span>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            According to my perspective, Yes, the Varna system is right. For beginners, Varna, a Sanskrit word with several meanings including type, order, colour, class or division of humans depending on the work they do, was used to refer to social classes.  These and other Hindu texts classified the society in principle into four varnas: * Shudras: laborers and service providers. * Vaishyas: agriculturalists and merchants. * Kshatriyas: rulers, warriors and administrators. * Brahmins: priests, scholars and teachers. Now, I would ask you, why is there
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in our modern society? Why are White people considered superior to Black people by the society? Why can't we the society consider them equal? Yes, that is the problem here. In the Treta Yuga and Dwapar Yuga, there was no discrimination, no
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . Everyone was co
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">

                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What is something you remember from childhood, and realize as an adult was something totally different than you thought it was at the time?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>

                  </div>

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/D-Kent-Deubner" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-something-you-remember-from-childhood-and-realize-as-an-adult-was-something-totally-different-than-you-thought-it-was-at-the-time/answer/D-Kent-Deubner" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            May 11, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Pastor at
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             First Christian Church (Disciples of Christ) Pleasant Hill, MO
                            </span>
                           </span>
                           (2000–present)

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            When I was a child in New Orleans I remember seeing signs that said “white only” and “colored only” I didn't understand. I played with kids of color, but sometimes my mom would call me to come home (not a cell phone, but a yell). I remember my dad stopping at the Gas Station and waiting for Odie, who was African American, to come out smiling to pump gas and look over the car. Mom would say, “ He's a nice colored man”. From a child's point of view I would look back and wonder what was so colorful? It was a long time before I even had a clue about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . Yes, I grew up in the midst of court mandated deseregation, and wondered why everyone was so mad. After all we got to go to school. Right? No, they were forced to come to my school.
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . In 1968 I watched the news and heard m
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Just when I thought Trump couldn’t sink any lower, last Friday happened.  CHIP SOMODEVILLA / GETTY IMAGES When PBS correspondent Yamiche Alcindor asked Trump about his plan to address racial inequality, the president pressed his fingers to his lips and said “shhh.” Pretty much every press conference Trump holds is an opportunity for him to show how classless, base, self-aggrandizing and out of touch with reality he is. He tells reporters to shut up, be quiet, they are “bad reporters” and they should be ashamed of themselves.  He calls them “fake news”. But to shh someone? Especially a black reporter asking about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in the middle of riots and protests? How fucking patronizing can he be? And he followed that up by declaring George Floyd is looking down from heaven and is “happy” to
                           </span>
                          </span>

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/With-white-supremacists-running-for-office-can-we-state-this-as-proof-of-systemic-racism/answer/Danny-Cee-9" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            February 9, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Chief Operating Officer (2017–present)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            “With gangs shooting people in Compton, can we state this as proof that black people are evil?” “With that Asian driver that cut me off the other day, can we state this as proof that Asians’ eyes are too small for driving properly?” “With the number of Taco Bell locations opening up in the USA, can we state this as proof that Mexicans are inundating this country?” No? Then why the hell would you even ask this question? Pretty much anyone born in America over the age of 35 with a clean record can run for president. Even if a blatant racist (let’s ignore Trump for now, as it’s a long winded debate) became POTUS, it would still have nothing to do with
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . You know what is
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            ? Slavery. Jim Crow Laws. Japanese Internment Camps. Those were systemically racist policies. If yo
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-do-you-think-of-Ilhan-Omar-calling-for-the-dismantlement-of-the-American-political-and-economic-systems-Are-you-on-board-with-that" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       What do you think of Ilhan Omar calling for the "dismantlement" of the American political and economic systems? Are you on board with that?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">

                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Mike Jones
                                 </span>
                                </a>

                              </div>

                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-do-you-think-of-Ilhan-Omar-calling-for-the-dismantlement-of-the-American-political-and-economic-systems-Are-you-on-board-with-that/answer/Mike-Jones-169" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            July 7, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Technology
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Over 30 years in the technology industry.
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Well, my first thought upon reading the question was “I bet this is another right winger pretending she said things she really didn’t.” I was right. Let’s go with the Fox News reporting of what she said: “We can’t stop at criminal justice reform or policing reform,” she said during an outdoor press conference. “We are not merely fighting to tear down the systems of oppression in the criminal justice system. We are fighting to tear down systems of oppression that exist in housing, in education, in health care, in employment, [and] in the air we breathe.” Yeah, I’m on board with that. There’s a lot of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            in a lot of parts of our society and a significant number of people who are where they are economically because of things having been that way for a long time. They’re better than
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Are-Canadians-watching-the-U-S-in-horror-and-consternation-as-Prime-Minister-Trudeau-says" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Are Canadians watching the U.S. in 'horror and consternation,' as Prime Minister Trudeau says?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Michael-Barnard-14" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Are-Canadians-watching-the-U-S-in-horror-and-consternation-as-Prime-Minister-Trudeau-says/answer/Michael-Barnard-14" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 3, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Lives in
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             Vancouver, BC
                            </span>
                           </span>
                           (1999–present)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Well, I’m qualified to answer this. I’m a Canadian, after all. I watched the entire response, not just the first part, so I’ll respond accordingly. To the specific question, yes, I am watching with horror and consternation. I’ve watched Donald Trump lean into the festering boil of US
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            since 2015 with horror and consternation. After eight years of good governance and sanity with an eloquent, intelligent, competent and gracious black man as President, to have it overturned. I’ve watched as hate crimes have soared under Trump. I’ve watched as hate crimes spike in counties where he holds rallies. I’ve watched as white supremacists praise him. I’ve watched as Trump has enflamed
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            and violence. I’ve watched as he’s encouraged the worst elements among the police to act in the worst ways
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
