                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/How-can-men-accept-that-they-cant-be-objectified-Feminism-doesn’t-define-objectification-of-men-as-something-women-do-to-men-but-as-the-by-product-of-male-power-fantasies/answer/Franklin-Veaux" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            August 30, 2016
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Professional Writer
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            This is one of those places where people invariably end up talking past each other because language is slippery, and if you don’t pin it down precisely it has a tendency to wriggle away from you. The question about whether men can be objectified is similar to the question of whether people who belong to a racial minority—for example, Black people in the United States—can be racist. There are two different definitions of “racism.”
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            can mean “holding prejudiced, stereotypical, or bigoted attitudes about people based on race,” by which definition Black people can and sometimes are racist. But
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            can also mean “of or relating to a
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , structural form of oppression in which members of one race oppress or deny participation in civil institutions to members of another race.” By tha
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Has-the-meaning-of-racism-been-changed-over-the-years" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Has the meaning of "
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       " been changed over the years?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Jon-Davis-10" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-4334418-200-NMSojs8wpnGe2cMPf8wmaeLp5s0K4rPM.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Jon-Davis-10" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Jon Davis
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Has-the-meaning-of-racism-been-changed-over-the-years/answer/Jon-Davis-10" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            October 15
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              History
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Amateur Military and Cultural Historian
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            When I was a kid, we were taught very clearly, very explicitly, and very often the meaning of “racism.”
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , at least to 3rd-grade me and everyone else in the 1990s, meant to treat someone differently because of their skin color. Merriam-Webster defines
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            a bit more distinctly: "a belief that race is the primary determinant of human traits and capacities and that racial differences produce an inherent superiority of a particular race." Between the two, you have what most people believe about
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . It’s a good definition, and operating by it has served us well. We’re objectively one of the least racist countries in the world and, at least until about 2013, we’ve only been getting better. But recent changes in the way
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is framed have fundamentally changed the word’s meaning, at
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-dont-Trump-supporters-feel-sold-out-by-the-President-when-after-saying-Were-going-to-march-down-to-the-Capitol-and-Im-going-to-march-with-you-Trump-went-back-inside-the-White-House-and-watched-the-violence" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Why don't Trump supporters feel sold out by the President when after saying "We're going to march down to the Capitol, and I'm going to march with you!" Trump went back inside the White House and watched the violence unfold on television?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Feifei-Wang-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">

                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Feifei-Wang-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Feifei Wang
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Why-dont-Trump-supporters-feel-sold-out-by-the-President-when-after-saying-Were-going-to-march-down-to-the-Capitol-and-Im-going-to-march-with-you-Trump-went-back-inside-the-White-House-and-watched-the-violence/answer/Feifei-Wang-6" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            January 12
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Lives in
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             San Diego, CA
                            </span>
                           </span>
                           (2016–present)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Because it is not about Trump. It is never about Trump. It is about the anger, fear, and resentment from the people who felt that they’re being wronged and ignored. Trump is not a leader, Trump and his cohort (the republican house representatives and senators, and the conservative media) are enablers. Trump didn’t create anything new. The rage and contempt were already there. Trump simply told them “It’s OK to let it out”. And our system (politicians and police force) told them “there won’t be any consequences”. That’s why these people praised Trump for “telling it as it is”. Because it means they get to express their
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            and bigotry freely without consequences. That’s why it doesn’t matter what Trump did, doesn’t matter how outrageous it was, these people do not care. I’m willing to go eve
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>

               </div>

             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/As-a-liberal-have-you-ever-been-criticized-for-not-being-far-enough-left" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       As a liberal, have you ever been criticized for not being far enough left?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-2498756-200-vbkfbneuedwoyvgkypydikqhbcooabdh.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Habib Fanny
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/As-a-liberal-have-you-ever-been-criticized-for-not-being-far-enough-left/answer/Habib-Fanny" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            Updated January 14, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Political Animal, Physician, Goofball, and All Around Nerd.
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            All the time. I’m pretty solidly left of center. But when I talk to some other liberals, I feel like I’m center-left. 1. I didn’t vote for Hillary Clinton in my primary, but I don’t believe she’s all that corrupt or conservative. She’s got two issues where she’s to the right of the Democratic electorate: foreign policy and her proximity to Big Finance. That’s it. I don’t think she was Voldemort. What’s more, her proposals were actually more realistic than Bernie’s, from both a mathematical and political standpoint. 2. I don’t think the entire Trump phenomenon can be ascribed to
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . 3. I don’t think a single-payer system by itself would fix our healthcare system. We need to identify specific and politically realistic mechanisms by which spending will be cut. Bernie’s current proposal is more of a s
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Biden-is-still-on-course-to-win-but-not-much-needs-to-change-for-Trump-to-gain-the-advantage-What-do-you-think" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">

                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Biden is still on course to win, but not much needs to change for Trump to gain the advantage. What do you think?
                      </span>

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       A white person told me
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       never existed before Obama got into office, therefore he made
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       . How can people be this oblivious?

                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dan-Holliday" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Dan-Holliday" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/A-white-person-told-me-racism-never-existed-before-Obama-got-into-office-therefore-he-made-racism-How-can-people-be-this-oblivious/answer/Dan-Holliday" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            September 29, 2016
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Lived in
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                            <span>
                             The United States of America
                            </span>
                           </span>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Sooooo …
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            didn’t exist … before Obama? Like, “right before” or “always before”? Which “before” does this omnibus genius mean? Like “before, even back in the 50’s when African Americans were being murdered by burning to death?” Or, “Just only maybe 15 minutes before Obama became president?” Obama sure brought out a lot of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            … by being the first black president. Back when my dad was a boy (per him), they had a saying, “That pisses me off more than seeing a rich nigger.” That is: Black people are acceptable as long as they’re poor and subservient. Then my delusions of superiority are confirmed. But put one in power, give him wealth, give him equality (god for bid superiority) and watch white people complain about the world! There’s a chorus on the far right that is accurate in point
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Is it racist to work on Martin Luther King Jr. Day?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Bobby-Strick" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-61973579-200-jevhcinnlnatzokhvgvhipunfbfzopbo.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Bobby-Strick" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                                  Robert Strickland
                                 </span>

                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Is-it-racist-to-work-on-Martin-Luther-King-Jr-Day/answer/Bobby-Strick" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            Updated January 30, 2019

                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           software engineer
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Is it racist to work on Martin Luther King Jr. Day? No one will fault you for having to work on MLK day. They will however fault you for not knowing the definition of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            .  As luck would have it though, I can help you with that…
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            noun rac·​ism | \ ˈrā-ˌsi-zəm also -ˌshi- \ Definition of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            1: a belief that race is the primary determinant of human traits and capacities and that racial differences produce an inherent superiority of a particular race 2: a doctrine or political program based on the assumption of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            and designed to execute its principles b: a political or social system founded on
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            3: racial prejudice or discrimination ~May your questions going forward be grounded in common sense.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Would-the-UK-be-a-really-wonderful-place-without-its-infamous-Class-System" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Would the UK be a really wonderful place without its infamous Class System?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>

                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Barnaby-Lane" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-64229590-200-wxntptcmnvqepkidexgmfjbfccyqlbcb.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">
