                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Hardly.
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            the way it is being presented is a hoax.
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            Systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            is a thing of the past. Yes, blacks and whites are killed committing crimes and resisting arrest. We just had two police officers nearly assassinated in their patrol car by a black man. Now if we had
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            police would be rounding up and arresting every black criminal they could. They would be beating them senseless too. Even when protesters were blocking the injured officers from getting medical help, the cops didn’t lose their cool. George Floyd was high as a kite and resisting arrest. There is zero evidence that it was racially motivated and it now looks as if the fentanyl in his system may have killed him. He was also complaining of not being able to breathe before he was ever on the ground. Hands up, dont s
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">

                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                       What is "common knowledge" about being a white person in the USA that's false?

                 </a>

                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/J-L-Van-Dijk" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">

                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/What-is-common-knowledge-about-being-a-white-person-in-the-USA-thats-false/answer/J-L-Van-Dijk" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 18, 2018
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Australia
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Australian
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            It’s a misconception that white people don’t face
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . Whenever you are a minority, you are likely to be the subject of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , and in some places white people are the minority. I’ve always lived in countries where the population is predominantly white, so I haven’t experienced it myself—but other people have told me their experiences. In particular, many Chinese people have admitted that their countrymen are very racist against whites. A friend of my son’s grew up in a remote part of Australia that was mainly occupied by indigenous Australians. Her family moved to the area for her father’s job when she was a young child, and she and her siblings were the only white children at the local school. As a pretty, blonde blue-eyed girl, her experience there was horrible. She was regularly bull
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">

            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       As a Canadian would you consider moving to the United States? Why or why not?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">

                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           Staff Engineer, Space Robotics at
                           <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">

                           (1995–present)

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            That would be a big Ontario sized no for me. If I was American, I would say a Texas sized no, but since I'm Canadian, and Ontario is 50% larger than Texas, an Ontario sized no is far more appropriate. Reasons are Canada has: 1. Lack of Canadian gun culture. I've lived all over, I currently live outside Canadas largest city, and I have no problem walking alone anywhere at any time of day. I don't bother locking the doors at night. I've never been robbed or mugged. And outside of hunting rifles or on a police officer, I've never seen a gun, nor heard one fired, nor know anyone that owns one. And I like it thay way. 2. Universal health care. It's not perfect, but no system is. I don't have to worry about the cost of health care if I lose my job, or have to deal with any heath insurance, deductibles,
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>

                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Race and Ethnicity
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             African in America
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            There was a patient I remember from my second year of training. He was a white man in his mid 60s who had been assigned to one of the residents in the program. A day or two after his admission, the resident almost got into trouble. It looked like the patient’s housekeeper or personal assistant had brought him some clothes and other items from home. Before the young doctor could comment on how nice and convenient it must be to have such help, it became clear that the “personal assistant” was in fact the patient’s wife! Why did the resident assume that she must be hired help, then? Because she was black. Was this
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            ? Many will wonder why I’m even bringing race into this. Maybe the doctor had noticed that this couple wasn’t as affectionate as other couples. Or maybe it was the way she was dr
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">

              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Do-you-really-think-that-these-recent-protests-riots-across-the-US-are-driven-by-Antifa-If-so-what-does-this-mean-for-our-nation" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       Do you really think that these recent protests/riots across the US are driven by Antifa? If so, what does this mean for our nation?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                              <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-flex--none" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-inlineFlex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; position: relative;">
                                <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-overflow--hidden qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderWidth--retinaOverride" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex; border-width: 2px; border-style: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 0px 0px 0.5px;">
                                 <div class="q-box qu-bg--white__ignore_dark_mode qu-borderRadius--circle" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 1px;">
                                 </div>
                                 <img class="q-image qu-display--block qu-size--36 qu-minWidth--36" size="36" src="https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-5276968-200-psxhsnnekbxtakwyoomihfbexfikmksk.jpeg" style="box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 100%; position: relative;"/>
                                 <div class="q-box qu-borderRadius--circle qu-borderAll qu-borderColor--darken Photo___StyledBox-sc-1x7c6d3-0 guhqSv" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; inset: 0px;">

                             </a>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="q-box qu-flex--auto" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: -1px; overflow-wrap: break-word; min-width: 0px;">
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                          <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-text qu-bold qu-color--gray_dark qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                              <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                               <div class="q-box qu-display--inline" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                                <a class="q-box qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                                 <span>
                                  Al Nelson
                                 </span>
                                </a>
                               </div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                            </div>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <span class="q-text qu-mx--tiny qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            ·
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/Do-you-really-think-that-these-recent-protests-riots-across-the-US-are-driven-by-Antifa-If-so-what-does-this-mean-for-our-nation/answer/Al-Nelson" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            June 1, 2020
                           </a>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Politics of the United States of America
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Modern Liberal
                            </span>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            No. They are not driven by antifa, they are driven by
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            systemic
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , toxic
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            . It means, our nation has increased, not decreased our existing problems of
                           </span>
                           <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                            racism
                           </span>
                           <span>
                            , white privilege, corruption and break down of the rule of law, because of President Trump and the Republicans that serve him.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-cursor--pointer qt_read_more qu-color--blue_dark qu-fontFamily--sans qu-bg--raised qu-pl--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) -16px 0px 14px 6px;">
                           (more)
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="q-box qu-mx--n_medium" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="CssComponent-sc-1oskqb9-0 cXjXFI">
             <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
              <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
               <div class="q-box qu-borderBottom qu-p--medium qu-pb--tiny" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                <span class="q-text qu-fontSize--regular qu-color--blue_dark qu-bold" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/How-can-one-address-delicate-issues-like-black-on-black-crime-and-the-problem-with-looting-on-protests-in-a-way-thats-still-clearly-100-anti-racist-acknowledging-systemic-racism-social-injustices-and-so-forth" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  <div class="q-flex qu-flexDirection--row" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                   <div class="q-inline qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline;">
                    <div class="q-text puppeteer_test_question_title" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                     <span class="q-box qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       How can one address delicate issues like "black on black crime," and the problem with looting on protests, in a way that's still clearly 100% anti-racist, acknowledging
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       systemic
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                       racism
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: rgba(46, 105, 255, 0.2);">
                      </span>
                      <span style="background: none;">
                       , social injustices, and so forth?
                      </span>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </span>
                <div class="q-box qu-mt--small qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                 <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                  <div>
                   <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                    <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex;">
                     <div class="q-box qu-mb--small" style="box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-box spacing_log_answer_header" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                       <div class="q-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; align-items: start; width: 100%;" width="100%">
                        <div class="q-inlineFlex qu-mr--small qu-alignItems--center" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-flex;">
                         <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                          <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-relative qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                            <div class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <a class="q-box qu-display--inline-flex qu-color--gray_dark qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/profile/Scott-Welch" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_blank">

                          <div class="q-text qu-color--gray qu-fontSize--small qu-passColorToLinks qu-truncateLines--1" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <a class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer qu-hover--textDecoration--underline qu-userSelect--text" href="/How-can-one-address-delicate-issues-like-black-on-black-crime-and-the-problem-with-looting-on-protests-in-a-way-thats-still-clearly-100-anti-racist-acknowledging-systemic-racism-social-injustices-and-so-forth/answer/Scott-Welch" style="box-sizing: border-box; transition-property: text-decoration; transition-duration: 180ms; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; border-radius: inherit;" target="_top">
                            December 25

                         </div>
                         <div class="q-flex qu-flexWrap--wrap" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; margin-top: 2px;">
                          <div class="q-text qu-truncateLines--2 qu-color--gray qu-passColorToLinks qu-fontSize--small" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <div class="q-box" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                            <span class="q-text" style="box-sizing: border-box; word-break: break-word;">
                             <span>
                              Race and Ethnicity
                             </span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="q-text qu-color--gray" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                             <span>
                              ·
                             </span>
                             Race is a funny thing.
                            </span>

                    <div class="q-relative spacing_log_answer_content puppeteer_test_answer_content" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                     <div class="q-click-wrapper qu-display--block qu-tapHighlight--white qu-cursor--pointer" style="box-sizing: border-box; font: inherit; outline: inherit; padding: 0px; width: 100%; color: inherit; text-align: inherit;" tabindex="0" width="100%">
                      <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                       <div class="q-box qu-cursor--pointer QTextTruncated___StyledBox-sc-1pev100-0 ejgusd" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                        <div class="q-relative" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: relative;">
                         <div class="CssComponent__CssInlineComponent-sc-1oskqb9-1 QTextTruncated___StyledCssInlineComponent-sc-1pev100-1 ehMuHA">
                          <span class="q-text qu-truncateLines--3 qt_truncated_inline qu-userSelect--text" style="box-sizing: border-box;">
                           <span>
                            Hahahaha “How can I be a racist asshat while pretending to not be a racists asshat?” “Black on black crime” is not a “delicate issue”, it’s flat-out racist asswipe. If you could read, you’d know that all crime is primarily personal and local. In fact, shocker, there’s more “white on white crime” than “black on black crime”. But I guess that does not matter because handwavy-handwavy. “Looting on protests” is a crime. We address that “delicate issue” by arresting and charging people who commit the crime, and then trying them. It’s pretty simple, really.
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </div>
                         <div class="q-absolute" style="box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; right: 0px; bottom: 0px;">

[{\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"In the US, racism is quite literally black and white. Those who have had a black ancestor is considered black and most others are white. Racism relies on the majority power there.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"In India, caste system is a continuum. Brahmins think they are superior to the Kshatriyas. The Kshatriyas rather than being offended are happy to be above the Vaishyas. And the Vaishyas have little issues with this as they are above the Shudras. And the Shudras have not complained as much either as they have dominated over a spectrum of \\\\u201coutcastes\\\\u201d. The more dominant of the outcastes discriminate the bottom part of the depressed castes. And the tribals are discriminated by outcastes.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"If it were a simple case of one caste dominating over the other, the thing would have been solved a long time ago. Unlike in the US, the upper most castes are very small minority and didn\\\\u2019t have much political power in the past. However, the spectrum allows almost every caste to have a dominant position in relation to some other caste. While they complain about the caste above, they are quite reluctant to release their hegemony over the caste below.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"A while ago a friend of mine was debating with me on the caste system. I argued that these hierarchies are meaningless. As he pushed on, I cited the example of Lord Krishna who was raised as a Shudra and was as holy as any other God. These caste divisions are crazy. For that he got offended saying that Krishna belonged to his caste [Yadav] and they were not Shudras and the one above them.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"horizontal-rule\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"And these are liberally mixed with economic classes, religious beliefs, ethnicities and language - the caste system is not standing alone but bolstered by several other systems.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"And a lot of the caste discrimination and chaos occurs in the middle. The Backward Castes [BC] of a slightly progressive state like Tamil Nadu, rather than fighting to remove the caste evils imposed on them often prey on the castes lower than them. Thus, the Vanniyars and Pallars fight in the north while Thevars and Parayars fight in the south - \\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}, {\\\"text\\\": \\\"Tamil Nadu\\\\u2019s caste fields: In 1 year, over 100 murders in two southern districts\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {\\\"link\\\": {\\\"type\\\": \\\"url\\\", \\\"url\\\": \\\"http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india-others/tns-caste-fields/\\\"}}}, {\\\"text\\\": \\\". None of these castes are upper castes in an absolute sense, however in a spectrum of castes they are above someone.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"Somewhat similar happen in Maharashtra between the middle caste Marathas and the Mahars - a slightly well-off among the Scheduled Castes.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"In the US, it is quite clear to all blacks that racism and slavery is evil. However, in India most people of the depressed castes including many Dalits refuse to give up the caste system or fight it straight as they too have someone to dominate over. While they would want the shackles imposed by those higher to be removed they don\\\\u2019t want that to be at the cost of removing shackles they impose on those lower than them.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}, {\\\"spans\\\": [{\\\"text\\\": \\\"Caste system and its discrimination are not easy to remove because most of us are in denial - we try to find quick scapegoats, but refuse to see that almost every community is intent on keeping the caste system for their own benefits.\\\", \\\"modifiers\\\": {}}], \\\"indent\\\": 0, \\\"quoted\\\": false, \\\"type\\\": \\\"plain\\\", \\\"is_rtl\\\": false}]}\",\"suggestedEdit\":{\"__typename\":\"AnswerSuggestedEdit\",\"id\":\"QW5zd2VyU3VnZ2VzdGVkRWRpdEAwOjU2MDQ0Mjk4OkFuc3dlclN1Z2dlc3RlZEVkaXQ=\"},\"__typename\":\"Answer\",\"viewerHasUpvoted\":false,\"numSocialVoters\":0,\"viewHash\":\"a-56044298_bc8a1ef58e445e42ab606c71ef0d6fc2\",\"permaUrl\":\"/Is-Indias-perception-of-the-caste-system-similar-to-Americas-perception-of-racism/answer/\\u0baa\\u0bbe\\u0bb2\\u0bbe\\u0b9c\\u0bbf-\\u0bb5\\u0bbf\\u0bb8\\u0bcd\\u0bb5\\u0ba8\\u0bbe\\u0ba4\\u0ba9\\u0bcd-Balaji-Viswanathan\",\"isVisible\":true,\"viewer\":{\"hasNetworkAdminModeEnabled\":false,\"id\":\"Vmlld2VyQDA6MA==\",\"bundleSubscription\":null,\"directSubscriptions\":[],\"__typename\":\"Viewer\",\"uid\":null,\"canReviewAnswers\":false},\"numExpertVoters\":0,\"isSensitive\":false,\"tribeItem\":null,\"monetizationAccessOption\":null,\"author\":{\"bundleSubscriptionStatus\":3,\"id\":\"VXNlckAwOjIzNTUwNTg=\",\"__typename\":\"User\",\"uid\":2355058,\"isAnon\":false,\"profileImageUrl\":\"https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-thumb-2355058-200-mffjyumnhcycpdqiqosvtgckcmeynarc.jpeg\",\"isVerified\":false,\"businessStatus\":null,\"profileUrl\":\"/profile/\\u0baa\\u0bbe\\u0bb2\\u0bbe\\u0b9c\\u0bbf-\\u0bb5\\u0bbf\\u0bb8\\u0bcd\\u0bb5\\u0ba8\\u0bbe\\u0ba4\\u0ba9\\u0bcd-Balaji-Viswanathan\",\"useTranslatedName\":false,\"names\":[{\"__typename\":\"UserName\",\"id\":\"VXNlck5hbWU6MjM1NTA1ODpMQVRO\",\"reverseOrder\":false,\"givenName\":\"Balaji\",\"familyName\":\"Viswanathan\",\"scriptCode\":\"LATN\"},{\"__typename\":\"UserName\",\"id\":\"VXNlck5hbWU6MjM1NTA1ODpUQU1M\",\"reverseOrder\":false,\"givenName\":\"\\u0baa\\u0bbe\\u0bb2\\u0bbe\\u0b9c\\u0bbf\",\"familyName\":\"\\u0bb5\\u0bbf\\u0bb8\\u0bcd\\u0bb5\\u0ba8\\u0bbe\\u0ba4\\u0ba9\\u0bcd\",\"scriptCode\":\"TAML\"}],\"adminNames\":[]},\"question\":{\"id\":\"UXVlc3Rpb25AMDoxODQ5NTcxNA==\",\"__typename\":\"Question\",\"qid\":18495714,\"url\":\"/Is-Indias-perception-of-the-caste-system-similar-to-Americas-perception-of-racism\",\"title\":\"{\
